sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import "./invitealert.css" import { Heading, Text, Button } from "grommet" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" const INVITE_TEXT = "Copy the link from below or from your URL bar:" const INVITE_HEADER = "Joining Info" const FILE_COPY_ICON = "file_copy" function InviteAlert() { const location = useLocation() const invitePath = location.pathname const inviteDomain = window.location.host const inviteProtocol = window.location.protocol const inviteLink = inviteProtocol + "//" + inviteDomain + invitePath return (
{INVITE_HEADER} {INVITE_TEXT}
{inviteLink}
{FILE_COPY_ICON}
) } export default InviteAlert;
